name: Sauteed Cucumbers
keywords: cucumber, onion, yogurt, gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian, side dish, summer
recipeIngredient: 4 medium-size onions, peeled and coarsely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and coarsely grate cucumbers into colander. Let stand until cooking time.
Heat butter in skillet and saute onions until they soften. Add cucumbers and cook, stirring occasionally, until mixture is soft, about 5 minutes. Season with salt, if desired.
To serve, blend in yogurt, if desired; sprinkle with parsley.
